FuncDef: The display qos bandwidth-adjustment information command displays information about the resource usage and bandwidth adjustment on a specific board.
Examples: Montior user-queue number per 500 ms: 32 k
Inbound upgrade threshold percent:  90 | Inbound degrade threshold percent:  60
Outbound upgrade threshold percent: 80 | Outbound degrade threshold percent: 60
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To query information about the resource usage and bandwidth adjustment on a specific board, run the display qos bandwidth-adjustment information slot slot-id command.
Precautions
This command applies to the LPUI-21-L/LPUI-51-L/LPUF-51/LPUF-51-B/LPUI-51/LPUI-51-B/LPUI-51-S/LPUS-51/LPUF-101/LPUF-101-B/LPUI-101/LPUI-101-B/LPUS-101/LPUF-51-E/LPUI-51-E/LPUI-51-CM/LPUF-120/LPUF-120-B/LPUF-120-E/LPUI-102-E/LPUI-120/LPUI-120-B/LPUI-120-L/LPUI-52-E/LPUI-120-E/LPUI-120-CM/LPUF-240/LPUF-240-B/LPUF-240-E/LPUI-240/LPUI-240-B/LPUI-240-CM/LPUI-240-L.
